articles.title: Returning Filipinos included in India travel ban; vaccine shipment faces delay - CNN Philippines
articles.description: Filipinos hoping to return home from India will be also be barred from entering the Philippines during the travel ban imposed amid the ongoing COVID-19 surge in the South Asian country, officials said on Wednesday.
articles.content: Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, April 28) Filipinos hoping to return home from India will be also be barred from entering the Philippines during the travel ban imposed amid the ongoing COVID-19 surge … [+4244 chars]

articles.title: Myanmar unity government tells ASEAN no talks until prisoners freed - CNA
articles.description: Myanmar's pro-democracy unity government, which includes members of parliament ousted by the military coup, has told Southeast Asia's regional bloc that it will not engage in talks until the junta releases all political prisoners.
